Package com.lucaf.robotic_core.stepperOnline.iDmRs

Class IDMRS

java.lang.Object
com.lucaf.robotic_core.impl.MotorInterface
com.lucaf.robotic_core.stepperOnline.iDmRs.IDMRS
Direct Known Subclasses:
DM556RS, ISV2RS
public class IDMRS extends MotorInterface
Class that represents the iDM_RS StepperOnline device

      state - shared map containing the device state

    • initialize

      public Future<Boolean> initialize() throws RejectedExecutionException
      Initializes the device asynchronously. This method sets up the device and performs homing if required.
      Overrides:
      initialize in class MotorInterface
      Returns:
      a Future object containing the result of the initialization (true if successful, false otherwise)
      Throws:
      RejectedExecutionException - if the executor service is shut down

      Overrides:

      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error stopping the device

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown() throws IOException
      Performs a graceful shutdown of internal executors and stops the device. This attempts to stop periodic polling and cancels queued tasks.
      Overrides:
      shutdown in class MotorInterface
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while stopping the device

    • estimateArrivalTime

      public int estimateArrivalTime(int distance) throws IOException
      Estimates the time required for the device to reach a specified distance.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance to cover (in steps)
      Returns:
      the estimated time (in seconds), or -1 if the estimation is not available
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error during the estimation
